title: put in queue because of crash
body: ok so my game crashed earlyer today twice and because of that i am now in a low priority 20 min queue....this isnt the first it has happend to me its happend a few other times causing me to be put in the 10 min and now the 20 queue.....please help me

replies.body:
Crashes can be caused by a wide variety of reasons. The most common is a connection issue along your network to the servers. If you had any errors that indicated this was caused be a disconnection from the server, or if you believe this to be a connection issue, I recommend you use our [Connection Log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) and try the steps it suggests.

If you saw a bugsplat error or have any indication this was caused by something else, let me know.
